infos.value: Forgive my failure... It is inexcusable.
There is naught to forgive. We were simply outnumbered—nothing more.
On the contrary, you held your ground very well.
You offer too much praise, Your Highness.
Boo!
S-Salire! Show some respect before the king!
Hah hah hah! It is nothing worth fretting over. We always interact in this manner.
B-but...
Salire, you seem disgruntled.
That's because Dorando and his men got away.
Your opponents were highly skilled. It appears that there were shinobi from Gouga among their ranks as well.
Hey, King Robb. What're we gonna do now?
We advance north now, with «Solidus» in tow.
Do you plan to take on Muraga's army in an all-out war?
Indeed, that is my intention.
It seems Sadali is headed toward Wezette as well.
Yes, I heard as much from Lynx.
This must all be part of his scheme.
We must bring an end to it all.
Heeey, King Robb...
I already know, Salire. You wish to pursue Dorando and Gargas, correct?
Whoa! King Robb is a mind reader!
S-Salire! What did I just say!?
If you speak of the last battle as a failure, then now is your chance for redemption.
...Brother?
We will not fail, Your Highness.
Aw, yeah! That's the spirit, Brother!
Lynx...and you, the shinobi from Leonis.
In Leonis, I am called Kitone.
What will you do next?
With your permission, Your Highness, there is the matter of Rairyuu...
I am of the same mind.
You have my leave.
Honor is important...but do not think too little of life's value. Understood?
Yes, Your Highness.
It'll be fiiine, King Robb. I'll make sure to look after my brother!
Sadali... I shall be waiting to inspect your severed head with my own eyes.
